title: For people who are struggling around the world! #Assim #calamity #assimalhakeem assim al hakeem
transcript: and before I wrap up any message or final Dua for any everybody that's struggling around the world brothers and sisters that are suffering and anyone who's struggling or suffering one of the six articles of Iman number six to believe in the Divine decree that Allah Asel has written 50,000 years before creating the whole universe gazillion years ago it was all prescribed it was all uh pre-ordained and decreed so whatever is happening to you Allah decreed it for a wisdom and reason feel content accept what Allah has written try to change within your ability but always be content that is from Allah and only Allah can change it
